All the images have dimensions 20\u00a0\u00d7\u00a020\u00a0arcsec2.\" data-path-from-xml=\"stz189fig3.jpg\" /><div class=\"fig-orig original-slide\"><a class=\"fig-view-orig js-view-large openInAnotherWindow\" href=\"/view-large/figure/134762079/stz189fig3.jpg\" data-path-from-xml=\"stz189fig3.jpg\" target=\"_blank\">Open in new tab</a><a data-section=\"134762079\" href=\"/DownloadFile/DownloadImage.aspx?image=https://oup.silverchair-cdn.com/oup/backfile/Content_public/Journal/mnras/484/3/10.1093_mnras_stz189/2/stz189fig3.jpeg?Expires=1611465236&Signature=tHvsNg8~I24ES-MeXG-LcuqzzJh2Kqta4hNpj2LgoTWLq9KjywbKIQq9dq1ignk1D8JPrgiswOho2aVvHJWDIwm12qy7Tdb-tX58ZsjPWFw2ZVvOFaVo2VfF3U8-9LAwNGbktVWZNZAIuSGwjjhJRuXLifL6-PcBX8uKoqSLlSaN5GSc7uc~WBrDB-uagzrv3jkcCXY7AtPgQyMiGORoOEg0J~QBX99OoXKtJif23iPSLLDYRiidPM4w9y2KBoP4Tmhk40YT4epQkEVFEh2-uvBeN0o5mTERwlTVlkST~ZwFyFunW6k-p1XpCZD2WdcZTgBoTLdy7tOSRsgudy3ZJA__&Key-Pair-Id=APKAIE5G5CRDK6RD3PGA&sec=134762079&ar=5290335&xsltPath=~/UI/app/XSLT&imagename=&siteId=5326\" class=\"download-slide\" data-path-from-xml=\"stz189fig3.jpg\">Download slide</a></div></div><div class=\"caption fig-caption\"><p class=\"chapter-para\">First row: images of five known confirmed lenses rediscovered by the ConvNets. Second row: known lenses in the LRG sample not identified by the ConvNets. All the images have dimensions 20\u00a0\u00d7\u00a020\u00a0arcsec<sup>2</sup>.</p></div></div><div content-id=\"fig3\" class=\"fig fig-modal reveal-modal\"><div class=\"label fig-label\">Figure 3.</div><div class=\"graphic-wrap\"><img class=\"content-image\" src=\"https://oup.silverchair-cdn.com/oup/backfile/Content_public/Journal/mnras/484/3/10.1093_mnras_stz189/2/m_stz189fig3.jpeg?Expires=1611465236&amp;Signature=ScFXHpQ1ltXiDEdr68cU3IDrpITVt8L9i~LH-LT5N3WRc1rDXRYrM-BzEvdiy7GwgZy~4rpzLKijdygfMYDToXjhX6IA4OxmxC6Bw5olscGG5MNJ7WOYXDog7U5kwb9SRkx1XZ2rfNb8NdnbWU5wAMXGQTg1UgpJMQPe9TRR2QIkkvSMKwK5GxZ0Ek3I20RBIiRWIOAbdyf1Om7Xf596pU0SGARFcCD6t5kyZpjyD17yhPntMtNRzknMS2UVAtilla5pjKkADUojPfYGdqIJrUqlsB9zwPU024KN39creTBHN8itOi6FWqXOjYaJ88x3uVMCxJ1a9RGN9a9HxHvbgw__&amp;Key-Pair-Id=APKAIE5G5CRDK6RD3PGA\" alt=\"First row: images of five known confirmed lenses rediscovered by the ConvNets. Below each image are shown the visual inspection score followed by the p-values of the one- and three-band ConvNets. Second row: known lenses in the LRG sample not identified by the ConvNets. All the images have dimensions 20\u00a0\u00d7\u00a020\u00a0arcsec2.\" data-path-from-xml=\"stz189fig3.jpg\" /><div class=\"fig-orig original-slide\"><a class=\"fig-view-orig js-view-large openInAnotherWindow\" href=\"/view-large/figure/134762079/stz189fig3.jpg\" data-path-from-xml=\"stz189fig3.jpg\" target=\"_blank\">Open in new tab</a><a data-section=\"134762079\" href=\"/DownloadFile/DownloadImage.aspx?image=https://oup.silverchair-cdn.com/oup/backfile/Content_public/Journal/mnras/484/3/10.1093_mnras_stz189/2/stz189fig3.jpeg?Expires=1611465236&Signature=tHvsNg8~I24ES-MeXG-LcuqzzJh2Kqta4hNpj2LgoTWLq9KjywbKIQq9dq1ignk1D8JPrgiswOho2aVvHJWDIwm12qy7Tdb-tX58ZsjPWFw2ZVvOFaVo2VfF3U8-9LAwNGbktVWZNZAIuSGwjjhJRuXLifL6-PcBX8uKoqSLlSaN5GSc7uc~WBrDB-uagzrv3jkcCXY7AtPgQyMiGORoOEg0J~QBX99OoXKtJif23iPSLLDYRiidPM4w9y2KBoP4Tmhk40YT4epQkEVFEh2-uvBeN0o5mTERwlTVlkST~ZwFyFunW6k-p1XpCZD2WdcZTgBoTLdy7tOSRsgudy3ZJA__&Key-Pair-Id=APKAIE5G5CRDK6RD3PGA&sec=134762079&ar=5290335&xsltPath=~/UI/app/XSLT&imagename=&siteId=5326\" class=\"download-slide\" data-path-from-xml=\"stz189fig3.jpg\">Download slide</a></div></div><div class=\"caption fig-caption\"><p class=\"chapter-para\">First row: images of five known confirmed lenses rediscovered by the ConvNets. Below each image are shown the visual inspection score followed by the <em>p</em>-values of the one- and three-band ConvNets. Second row: known lenses in the LRG sample not identified by the ConvNets. All the images have dimensions 20\u00a0\u00d7\u00a020\u00a0arcsec<sup>2</sup>.</p></div></div><p class=\"chapter-para\">The visual classification appears to depend on the signal-to-noise ratio. For example, the candidate SC\u00a0J083726+015639, found in HSC data by Sonnenfeld et\u00a0al. (<span class=\"xrefLink\" id=\"jumplink-bib127\"></span><a href=\"javascript:;\" reveal-id=\"bib127\" data-open=\"bib127\" class=\"link link-ref link-reveal xref-bibr\">2018a</a>) is present in two adjacent KiDS tiles, and the ConvNets retrieve it from both tiles (the ConvNets select three more HSC candidates). Nevertheless, the human classifiers, in general, give very different scores to the same candidate depending on the quality of the images (Fig.\u00a0<span class=\"xrefLink\" id=\"jumplink-fig4\"></span><a href=\"javascript:;\" reveal-id=\"fig4\" data-open=\"fig4\" class=\"link link-reveal link-table xref-fig\">4</a>). Thus, it is fair to assume that many \u2018good\u2019 candidates are lost from our sample if we preferentially select only those candidates with high visual-inspection score. On the other hand, there are also clearly cases where the ConvNets select candidates without any human-identifiable lensing feature being present.</p>                        <a id=\"134762081\" scrollto-destination=\"134762081\"></a>\r\n<div data-id=\"fig4\" class=\"fig fig-section js-fig-section\"><div class=\"label fig-label\">Figure 4.</div><div class=\"graphic-wrap\"><img class=\"content-image\" src=\"https://oup.silverchair-cdn.com/oup/backfile/Content_public/Journal/mnras/484/3/10.1093_mnras_stz189/2/m_stz189fig4.jpeg?Expires=1611465236&amp;Signature=pAakmCmHLfCohM5Cp5e3ejyqU4oqdC4x~p2PRmhiOLYqM5VVFoFJ0S55cRm7hpp0tQ8vdyviSgdZj0Z-e8N4E4RC2GEqTAO04EYLdcOWMj7MJ6JIvfm8s5OVCyd1Y9LzIuvvLDI8ZKYo~79xos4fDWx9joax3Hkw62xvz1umbPvCswSlVByspeOT-K1Ukgm4fBlJ9zF1Bb~SUrzahaQZ-Fcv-hEE~mNyD8fFLreztyuDkIgy1RBnIv6m9J6DM4DxINNitmVrREwBDuM~-fbRP95H8H3x9Cz5LmeM2dluv~jnaU8W0OY1-T06R1ahvm9mCF~x9g3cJNENT3UEEAUP6A__&amp;Key-Pair-Id=APKAIE5G5CRDK6RD3PGA\" alt=\"Images of the same candidate retrieved by the ConvNets in two different survey tiles. The scores from the visual classification (the numbers below the images) are different because of the different quality of the images. Each image has dimensions 20\u00a0\u00d7\u00a020\u00a0arcsec2.\" data-path-from-xml=\"stz189fig4.jpg\" /><div class=\"fig-orig original-slide\"><a class=\"fig-view-orig js-view-large openInAnotherWindow\" href=\"/view-large/figure/134762081/stz189fig4.jpg\" data-path-from-xml=\"stz189fig4.jpg\" target=\"_blank\">Open in new tab</a><a data-section=\"134762081\" href=\"/DownloadFile/DownloadImage.aspx?image=https://oup.silverchair-cdn.com/oup/backfile/Content_public/Journal/mnras/484/3/10.1093_mnras_stz189/2/stz189fig4.jpeg?Expires=1611465236&Signature=rbPWvRVjJ8ghnXrOzyTo2dadmkD1w4Bwqd~rKdvaeaOP4UvZk3xszk1WhTaO9nI56xwfj0Nz63aS4fuGoauAddU2i4kGAkidUMCS~ItDUtu0mUrkSsiTog5YQplIXfOxSHo~9uGV~mHcFzIIVnkvfUZW6laJyhT6QhbuIAg8X65-Tnrlqu0feZj7LIT4gtFQ5xRQMQz~hoXcXwdLShp-c3StVkYibnqnaW5SxZorf3Y83Drybrsa79wyHw17fWHj5xjB444VcOzXpXjQTBfu0Q3pZBpueBfToIN77rLipCpyPsvDbRLvkafqFk3itrchQmaFclpuVl5km2KC24hsFg__&Key-Pair-Id=APKAIE5G5CRDK6RD3PGA&sec=134762081&ar=5290335&xsltPath=~/UI/app/XSLT&imagename=&siteId=5326\" class=\"download-slide\" data-path-from-xml=\"stz189fig4.jpg\">Download slide</a></div></div><div class=\"caption fig-caption\"><p class=\"chapter-para\">Images of the same candidate retrieved by the ConvNets in two different survey tiles. The scores from the visual classification (the numbers below the images) are different because of the different quality of the images. Each image has dimensions 20\u00a0\u00d7\u00a020\u00a0arcsec<sup>2</sup>.</p></div></div><div content-id=\"fig4\" class=\"fig fig-modal reveal-modal\"><div class=\"label fig-label\">Figure 4.</div><div class=\"graphic-wrap\"><img class=\"content-image\" src=\"https://oup.silverchair-cdn.com/oup/backfile/Content_public/Journal/mnras/484/3/10.1093_mnras_stz189/2/m_stz189fig4.jpeg?Expires=1611465236&amp;Signature=pAakmCmHLfCohM5Cp5e3ejyqU4oqdC4x~p2PRmhiOLYqM5VVFoFJ0S55cRm7hpp0tQ8vdyviSgdZj0Z-e8N4E4RC2GEqTAO04EYLdcOWMj7MJ6JIvfm8s5OVCyd1Y9LzIuvvLDI8ZKYo~79xos4fDWx9joax3Hkw62xvz1umbPvCswSlVByspeOT-K1Ukgm4fBlJ9zF1Bb~SUrzahaQZ-Fcv-hEE~mNyD8fFLreztyuDkIgy1RBnIv6m9J6DM4DxINNitmVrREwBDuM~-fbRP95H8H3x9Cz5LmeM2dluv~jnaU8W0OY1-T06R1ahvm9mCF~x9g3cJNENT3UEEAUP6A__&amp;Key-Pair-Id=APKAIE5G5CRDK6RD3PGA\" alt=\"Images of the same candidate retrieved by the ConvNets in two different survey tiles. The scores from the visual classification (the numbers below the images) are different because of the different quality of the images. Each image has dimensions 20\u00a0\u00d7\u00a020\u00a0arcsec2.\" data-path-from-xml=\"stz189fig4.jpg\" /><div class=\"fig-orig original-slide\"><a class=\"fig-view-orig js-view-large openInAnotherWindow\" href=\"/view-large/figure/134762081/stz189fig4.jpg\" data-path-from-xml=\"stz189fig4.jpg\" target=\"_blank\">Open in new tab</a><a data-section=\"134762081\" href=\"/DownloadFile/DownloadImage.aspx?image=https://oup.silverchair-cdn.com/oup/backfile/Content_public/Journal/mnras/484/3/10.1093_mnras_stz189/2/stz189fig4.jpeg?Expires=1611465236&Signature=rbPWvRVjJ8ghnXrOzyTo2dadmkD1w4Bwqd~rKdvaeaOP4UvZk3xszk1WhTaO9nI56xwfj0Nz63aS4fuGoauAddU2i4kGAkidUMCS~ItDUtu0mUrkSsiTog5YQplIXfOxSHo~9uGV~mHcFzIIVnkvfUZW6laJyhT6QhbuIAg8X65-Tnrlqu0feZj7LIT4gtFQ5xRQMQz~hoXcXwdLShp-c3StVkYibnqnaW5SxZorf3Y83Drybrsa79wyHw17fWHj5xjB444VcOzXpXjQTBfu0Q3pZBpueBfToIN77rLipCpyPsvDbRLvkafqFk3itrchQmaFclpuVl5km2KC24hsFg__&Key-Pair-Id=APKAIE5G5CRDK6RD3PGA&sec=134762081&ar=5290335&xsltPath=~/UI/app/XSLT&imagename=&siteId=5326\" class=\"download-slide\" data-path-from-xml=\"stz189fig4.jpg\">Download slide</a></div></div><div class=\"caption fig-caption\"><p class=\"chapter-para\">Images of the same candidate retrieved by the ConvNets in two different survey tiles. The scores from the visual classification (the numbers below the images) are different because of the different quality of the images. Each image has dimensions 20\u00a0\u00d7\u00a020\u00a0arcsec<sup>2</sup>.</p></div></div><p class=\"chapter-para\">To examine the other extreme of the classification, Figs\u00a0<span class=\"xrefLink\" id=\"jumplink-fig5\"></span><a href=\"javascript:;\" reveal-id=\"fig5\" data-open=\"fig5\" class=\"link link-reveal link-table xref-fig\">5</a> and\u00a0<span class=\"xrefLink\" id=\"jumplink-fig6\"></span><a href=\"javascript:;\" reveal-id=\"fig6\" data-open=\"fig6\" class=\"link link-reveal link-table xref-fig\">6</a> present the candidates that the ConvNets classify with values of <em>p</em>\u00a0&gt;\u00a00.999, along with the scores from our visual inspection. For the three-band ConvNet, some of these extremely high-confidence ConvNet candidates received low visual classification scores; there is even a case with visual-inspection score of zero. It is clear that there remains significant disagreements between human and ConvNet classifications, and that both classification methods are prone to some level of bias and error. Nonetheless, Fig.\u00a0<span class=\"xrefLink\" id=\"jumplink-fig7\"></span><a href=\"javascript:;\" reveal-id=\"fig7\" data-open=\"fig7\" class=\"link link-reveal link-table xref-fig\">7</a> demonstrates that the visual-inspection scores and the <em>p</em>-values are indeed correlated. The figure shows a positive correlation between average values of the <em>p</em>-values for different bins of the visual-inspection score. Hence, even if the classification schemes from humans and ConvNets differ, both tend to agree to a certain extent on what constitutes a \u2018good\u2019 lens candidate.</p>                        <a id=\"134762083\" scrollto-destination=\"134762083\"></a>\r\n<div data-id=\"fig5\" class=\"fig fig-section js-fig-section\"><div class=\"label fig-label\">Figure 5.</div><div class=\"graphic-wrap\"><img class=\"content-image\" src=\"https://oup.silverchair-cdn.com/oup/backfile/Content_public/Journal/mnras/484/3/10.1093_mnras_stz189/2/m_stz189fig5.jpeg?Expires=1611465236&amp;Signature=EeNpRsyH9OgLD1RUDf80CoMAgqihmvK7drRWFhqSWIi~Z6Hp8Adaqx9x~aau-CrTo1-6K9DhBApyb5yyeV8Msh1VQj1apiVrbHIzjshO8LXe1pyB5oeYmOR~8rCEkDa4DwfcWx7cKhHZgQRikfyx7s5mg9d4KypSox0LzLUliUJYy97tCDUXaFVYz66cTL8ntcH7P2b17ZdSnNnnGfbOmL235j32rWQwtuq6OpZxmn~C5L3hKAA17DD-z4NR0YbizkJd7WyCiybb7eCa7XwwSIZvLCIjF8CmjEUlUa6Ac~Zta-JXfJEVxtRJ5x9FiLAE2v1eX3PoGJlGRgRE1aSzdA__&amp;Key-Pair-Id=APKAIE5G5CRDK6RD3PGA\" alt=\"Candidates selected by the three-band ConvNet with p\u00a0&gt;\u00a00.999. The scores from the visual inspection are shown below the images. In the last row, the lens J1244+0106 is shown twice because it appears twice in the LRG sample since is centred on two different LRGs. Each image has dimensions of 20\u00a0\u00d7\u00a020\u00a0arcsec2.\" data-path-from-xml=\"stz189fig5.jpg\" /><div class=\"fig-orig original-slide\"><a class=\"fig-view-orig js-view-large openInAnotherWindow\" href=\"/view-large/figure/134762083/stz189fig5.jpg\" data-path-from-xml=\"stz189fig5.jpg\" target=\"_blank\">Open in new tab</a><a data-section=\"134762083\" href=\"/DownloadFile/DownloadImage.aspx?image=https://oup.silverchair-cdn.com/oup/backfile/Content_public/Journal/mnras/484/3/10.1093_mnras_stz189/2/stz189fig5.jpeg?Expires=1611465236&Signature=M6Croo939kDbZQSpnKA-1khS-CF4Jp9feBuyyoOfscSUWZLbQuJCDqhYp1WfOUYWxN0yzyzppPULlvUgKaJPwOHppMHMmjMeOZeGESCD5RDp6WbGQDdYDZ94cfwnzlfzQn3mMqwM-qmtgVbhtyn8RO0a1hBn~3K8A5PeuPEe5eShAhkDFP94po5Eojq4lnS7FbNCZdcaYo7Ydm8F9nYve1Fa-EhioJcAiXVA3fFGL6jRGgqjS8euL8sETH6l-HmAXH8uWiIWU5qRjKnn9kucViinhDYlc3Pcf6FgNHKDw1dE1JVehSeqV18-rlCC1hFT55Sy-2N2IQWiJWTs4VD09w__&Key-Pair-Id=APKAIE5G5CRDK6RD3PGA&sec=134762083&ar=5290335&xsltPath=~/UI/app/XSLT&imagename=&siteId=5326\" class=\"download-slide\" data-path-from-xml=\"stz189fig5.jpg\">Download slide</a></div></div><div class=\"caption fig-caption\"><p class=\"chapter-para\">Candidates selected by the three-band ConvNet with <em>p</em>\u00a0&gt;\u00a00.999.
